message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to us and I believe it's equally valuable to you. To start, I'll offer it to you for $100.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to pay more. In order to move forward, I am willing to consider $100 as the final price for the product.
